task: Summarize key AI healthcare use cases and their impacts.
response: AI in healthcare enhances diagnostics (e.g., imaging), personalizes treatment (genomics), predicts outcomes (predictive analytics), optimizes operations (virtual assistants), and accelerates drug discovery, improving accuracy, reducing costs, and boosting patient outcomes.

task: 3. Identify top 3 risks of AI in healthcare and propose mitigation strategies.
response: 1. Bias in AI models due to skewed training data—mitigate with diverse datasets and regular audits. 2. Data privacy breaches—counter with encryption and strict access controls. 3. Over-reliance on AI leading to clinical complacency—train clinicians to use AI as a tool, not a replacement.
